The Aesthetics Beauté

Coco Mademoiselle EDP

Intense - Chanel

I'm using this since January and I don't see a huge difference between this one and the original edp.

The Intense version does not have a good longevity on my skin, about 3 hours and next to my skin.

I will buy again.

Warm fragrance, have the classic Chanel sent and it is a high class woman vibes

Longevity - 3 to 4 hours

Sillage - Moderate in first hour, after this, became soft

Winter and Autumn
